data.title: WordPress Theme
data.meta_description: Poseidon is an elegant designed WordPress theme featuring a splendid fullscreen image slideshow. The clean typography and spacious white layout makes it great to share your stories. You can use the theme as simple blog or easily create a news website with the widget-based Magazine Homepage template.
